formatDescription: The AGS Data Format was created in 1991 by the Association of Geotechnical and Geoenvironmental Specialists, as a way of transferring data between different organisations in the geotechnical/geoenvironmental industry. It provides a way of exchanging said data reliably, independent of software/ hardware and operating system, and to a consistent standard.
provenanceCompoundName: AGS / Association of Geotechnical and Geoenvironmental Specialists

internalSignatures.name: AGS 4 Data Format
internalSignatures.note: Offset 0-4 from beginning of file, magic bytes: "(GROUP|**PROJ)"*“{0-1}PROJ_ID",{0-1}("PROJ_NAME",”|"PROJ_AGS",")*“{0-1}ABBR_HDNG",”{0-1}ABBR_CODE","
